heroes.name: Alien-X
heroes.about: We're the most powerful being in the universe. We change the very nature of space and time.
heroes.comment: I am the Omnitrix's DNA sample of a Celestialsapien from the Forge of Creation.

heroes.name: Humungousaur
heroes.about: You've just made a humungous mistake!
heroes.comment: I am the Omnitrix's DNA sample of a Vaxasaurian from the planet Terradino.

heroes.name: Grey Matter
heroes.about: How do I stop this thing? I'm a thinker, not a fighter! Think...think...
heroes.comment: I am the Omnitrix's DNA sample of a Galvan from the planet Galvan Prime.

heroes.name: Heat Blast
heroes.about: Hey! Why don't you pick on someone with real firepower?
heroes.comment: I am the Omnitrix's DNA sample of a Pyronite from the star Pyros.

heroes.name: Way Big
heroes.about: Whoa... check me out! I'm not just big, I'm WAY BIG!
heroes.comment: I am the Omnitrix's DNA sample of a To'kustar, a race of ultra-rare, gigantic aliens that are created in Cosmic Storms.

heroes.name: Big Chill
heroes.comment: I am the Omnitrix's DNA sample of a Necrofriggian from the planet Kylmyys.

heroes.name: Rath
heroes.comment: I am the Omnitrix/Ultimatrix's DNA sample of an Appoplexian from Appoplexia.

heroes.name: Four Arms
heroes.about: Give up, Trombipulor, I've got you outnumbered. Four arms to two!
heroes.comment: I am the Omnitrix's DNA sample of a Tetramand from the planet Khoros

heroes.name: Cannonbolt
heroes.comment: I am the Omnitrix's DNA sample of an Arburian Pelarota from the planet Arburia.
